experience: You and Naila both know Andrew Sell, Michael Bailey, and 2 others
Business Development and Digital/eCommerce Recruiting Manager

Hub Consulting, Inc was set up to service the rapidly growing digital staffing space, we help customers initiate and realize digital strategies to gain a competitive advantage in the modern business world.  Focus:Hub Consulting drives our clients digital strategies by supplying industry leading talent in eCommerce, Content Management, User Experience, Mobile, Social and IoT.
Business Development Manager / Senior Technical Recruiter

The Lemont Group connects smart, innovative and result-driven talent with start-ups and established companies ready to expand and lead the market.  Our focus is on our network of Developers (Software, Digital/Mobile), Designers (UX/UI), Product Managers and Tech Professionals passionate about technology and eager to add value.
Business Development Manager / Senior Technical Recruiter

ERP Analysts is an Oracle Platinum Partner specialized in Oracle product implementations, upgrades and production support for PeopleSoft, Fusion Applications, Fusion Middleware, EPM, Business Intelligence and Identity Management solutions for mid-market and fortune 500 companies.Personal contributions include growing a robust database and establishing trusted relationships with Senior-level consultants, vendors and clients.  Participated in Oracle Openworld and Defense Conferences in San Diego and Washington DC.  Introduced key talents/teams for winning consulting projects in the Public sector (Cities, Counties and School Districts) and Higher Ed space (Colleges and Universities).ERPA values and allows for work-life balance.  The entire team from top management and consultants to Payroll staff are kind, considerate and well-intentioned.  There is a sincere importance placed on meeting 100% of what is promised to their clients.

K2 Partnering Solutions is a global recruitment company with technical expertise, in-depth market knowledge and an international presence on the ERP (SAP, Oracle), Enterprise Cloud (SFDC), Analytics/Big Data, Enterprise Mobility market and Social/Digital technologies.Personal contributions include being the first hired recruiter in the SF Office to establish and increase the company's reach in the Oracle/ PeopleSoft market.  Organized meet-and-greet events with consultants and participated in Oracle User Group and Oracle OpenWorld conferences. Assisted in growing (interview process,  training, reviewing) the SF office recruiting team.  K2 Partnering is agile and able to quickly morph as trends in technology shift and evolve. It's the perfect match for those who can keep pace with working hard and playing hard.  K2 Partnering hires the best colleagues you'll ever have, some of whom you'll call life-long friends.

Join the team that will bring your career to the next level!Hub Consulting (www.hub.consulting):naila.basa@hub.consulting-  Lead iOS Developer-  Lead Android Developer-  Lead Architect/Developer-  Senior Project Manager (SCM in Retail)-  Senior Marketing Manager (Retail)-  Product Manager (Loyalty Program)-  Senior Product Manger (Retail)Roles for Various Key Clients:-  PeopleSoft FSCM Functional, Developer and Analysts/Testers-  Sr. Big Data Engineer (Java, Hadoop)-  Business Intelligence (BI) Developer-  Sr./Mid/Jr. Full Stack Developer-  Team Lead/Manager/Scrum Master (Ruby, Java, REST API)-  Technical Sales Engineer (Pre-Sales, Prior Development or Architect experience)-  Sr. C#.Net Developer (SaaS, Visual Studio, ASP.NET development, Web Services/WCF)-  Software Engineer (Java, PHP, Open Source)Please send an invite through LinkedIn, forward your resume and feel free to call/email/IM:direct: (714) 656 6481skype: nailabasanaila@theLemontGroup.com
